pages.text: $(bgreen)Lily Pad$() never complains. It never wants to know what's going on. Put a plant on top of it, it won't say a thing.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)25$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Super Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(bred)block$() plant that can support plants place on water.
